localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Improve your teams collaboration and invite them to your very own shared digital whiteboard. Just start a new project and draw away. Our web whiteboard is incredibly fast and simple to use, so anyone can do it. Yeah including Phil from accounting.
nodes.title: Online Whiteboard - Easy to use online whiteboard where you can share anything

nodes.title: React Native ARIA - React Hooks to make accessible React Native design systems

nodes.excerpt: An intuitive method without piano sheet music No more need to know anymore how to decipher piano sheet music or to know music theory. In a few seconds, you recognize the notes to be played on a keyboard. More than 1,000 songs from every genre and skill level
nodes.title: La Touche Musicale - You can learn piano online easily with the songs you love

nodes.excerpt: How do you craft an interview process that accurately assesses a candidate's skill level while ensuring you're not eliminating qualified candidates? Take this 5 minute quiz and get actionable recommendations to improve your technical interview.
nodes.title: NOT THE PIPELINE - Take a 5 minute quiz and fix your tech interview

nodes.excerpt: CLIP Playground lets you test OpenAI's new model CLIP from your browser. CLIP is a GPT-3 like AI you can use to perform a variety of tasks that pair both images and text.
nodes.title: CLIP Playground - OpenAI's CLIP model in your browser, like GPT-3 for images

nodes.excerpt: Decentraland is a decentralized virtual reality platform powered by the Ethereum blockchain. Within the Decentraland platform, users can create, experience, and monetize their content and applications.
nodes.title: Decentraland 2.0 - Explore a virtual world owned by its users

nodes.excerpt: We help you track, discover and predict TikTok Trends by location, creator, category & more. We also provide personalized trend suggestions specifically for you! With this app you can find trends first and use them to grow your account & create viral videos!
nodes.title: TrendTok - AI powered TikTok analytics for trends, content & sounds

nodes.excerpt: Product fit is the Product/Market fit engine for SaaS companies. Measure and track the PMF of your SaaS application in app with your users. See your PMF score over time, identify the benefits and improvements to focus on from your target market users.
nodes.title: Product Fit - Measure product/market fit in app with your users.

nodes.excerpt: A lil' bot who's meant to be a companion. Pet it & it'll wiggle its tail, ignore it & it'll ask for attention. The bot uses a camera, for facial recognition & can listen/respond to voice via mics. It knows when you're giving it a hug through touch sensors.
nodes.title: Nicobo by Panasonic - Your new pet...that farts

nodes.excerpt: Yada is an all-in-one solution that allows you to brainstorm, edit, and present your ideas. Start by writing your document & choose how to present your content with views. Iterate on the content or views in any order & at any time. Everything stays up to date.

nodes.title: Sensity - The deepfake detection platform

nodes.excerpt: Labeling images is essential for good computer vision models. Roboflow Annotate empowers you to annotate images easily & model-assisted labeling can take a first pass at labeling your images for you! You can export to any format (COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XMLâ€¦)
